idea-plugin.name: Realigner
idea-plugin.description:
The Realigner plugin is helpful e.g. to quickly convert lines of text to comma separated lists and vice versa. Additionally the plugin adds a tool to wrap a selection, the current line or each of multiple selected lines with surrounding strings. The wrap tool of the plugin also provides options for escaping single, double quote and backslash characters and to remove white-space lines from a multi-line selection. The plugin settings allow for setting up configurations of quickly accessible preconfigured options, available than in the wrap dialog.

Realigner adds the following editing tools:
  • Ctrl+Shift+Alt+J - Joins selected lines by removing linefeeds. Optionally, a "gluing" string can be used as delimiter
  • Ctrl+Shift+Alt+L - Splits current line or selection into multiple lines at, before or after an arbitrary delimiter
  • Ctrl+Shift+Alt+W - Wraps current line / selection / each of multiple selected lines with an arbitrary prefix and/or postfix string

Please note: This plugin is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.

The icons used in this plugin are part of the Fugue iconset (http://p.yusukekamiyamane.com/)
